TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FillMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何填充闭合路径的内部。

span.span: Specifies how the interior of a closed path is filled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序填充的路径使用两种填充模式之一内部： 备用或缠绕。An application fills the interior of a path using one of two fill modes: alternate or winding. 模式将确定如何填充和剪辑闭合图形的内部。The mode determines how to fill and clip the interior of a closed figure. 默认模式为备用。The default mode is Alternate. 若要确定在备用模式下的闭合图形的内部，请从路径中的任意起始点到某个时间点在路径外显然绘制的线条。To determine the interiors of closed figures in the alternate mode, draw a line from any arbitrary start point in the path to some point obviously outside the path. 如果在行超过了奇数个路径段，起始点在已关闭的区域内，因此填充或剪辑区域的一部分。If the line crosses an odd number of path segments, the starting point is inside the closed region and is therefore part of the fill or clipping area. 为偶数的交点意味着点不是一个可以填充或剪辑区域中。An even number of crossings means that the point is not in an area to be filled or clipped. 填充开放图形或剪辑使用行连接到图中的第一个点的最后一个点。An open figure is filled or clipped by using a line to connect the last point to the first point of the figure. 卷绕模式会考虑每个交点处的路径段的方向。The Winding mode considers the direction of the path segments at each intersection. 它将添加一个用于每个顺时针旋转的交集，并减去另一个用于每个开始沿逆时针方向的交集。It adds one for every clockwise intersection, and subtracts one for every counterclockwise intersection. 如果结果为非零，点被认为在填充或剪辑区域内。If the result is nonzero, the point is considered inside the fill or clip area. 计数为零意味着该点超出填充或剪辑区域。A zero count means that the point lies outside the fill or clip area. 图为顺时针或逆时针基于在其中绘制图段的顺序。A figure is considered clockwise or counterclockwise based on the order in which the segments of the figure are drawn. ## Examples 以下示例创建具有一个开放的图形 (arc) 和一个闭合的图形 （椭圆） 的路径。The following example creates a path that has one open figure (an arc) and one closed figure (an ellipse). FillPath 方法填充默认的填充模式，这是 Alternate.The 根据路径下图显示了示例代码的输出。The FillPath method fills the path according to the default fill mode, which is Alternate.The following illustration shows the output of the example code. 请注意，像关闭一条直线从其结束点到起始点的最开放的图形 （根据备选） 填充的路径。Note that the path is filled (according to Alternate) as if the open figure were closed by a straight line from its ending point to its starting point. ![填充开放路径](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "填充开放路径")![Fill Open Path](~/add/media/fillopenpath.png "Fill Open Path") 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/CS/Class1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ConstructingDrawingPaths/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Alternate = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode Winding = int32(1)
